title: I’ve Heard that Dragon Eggs are Delicious - Novel Updates
tags: Cute Story   Dragons   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Oneshot   Seme Protagonist

description:
A fairy tale-style little bedtime story with western fantastical elements.

Maladroit, mensao, invincible doting dragon x foodie prince who wants to be a dragon knight

A short story. It’s a cookie so sweet that it’ll make you thirsty.>
